# Playcocola

> The community-powered playtesting platform for indie game developers.

## Overview

Playcocola is a browser-based playtesting tool that helps indie game developers get human feedback on their games quickly and affordably. No SDKs, no heavy installs, no registration required for playtesters.

**Website:** https://playcocola.com
**App:** https://app.playcocola.com
**Twitter:** @playcocola

## Core Value Proposition

- Get playtesting feedback in minutes, not weeks
- Starting price: €2 per 20-minute session
- Zero integration required — works with any game
- Access to a passionate community of indie game enthusiasts

## How It Works

1. **Set up a Play Session** — Add your game and describe expectations for playtesters
2. **Share with the community** — Use your own testers or tap into Playcocola's playtester pool
3. **Watch the recordings** — Get synced videos of gameplay with voice commentary and timed comments

## Features

### For Developers
- Browser-based platform (no installation)
- Video recordings with "thinking aloud" audio
- Timed comments synced to video timestamps
- All feedback organized in one dashboard
- Side-by-side video and feedback viewing
- Upload game builds directly to the platform
- Customizable required checkboxes (NDAs, terms)
- Custom finished session messages
- Playtester reward descriptions
- Public or private play sessions

### For Playtesters
- No registration required to record
- Privacy controls (record full screen, single app, or browser tab)
- Optional playtester accounts for community features
- Easy commenting during gameplay

## Pricing

| Plan | Price | Features |
|------|-------|----------|
| Hobbyist | Free | 2 hours video limit, bring your own playtesters, 1-week video storage |
| Indie | €2/20 min | Unlimited recording, playtesters community access, 1-month video storage |
| Premium | €7/20 min | Playtester recruiting included, money-back guarantee |

## Target Users

- Indie game developers
- Solo developers
- Small game studios
- Game jam participants
- Anyone needing quick, affordable playtesting

## Key Differentiators

- **No subscription traps** — Pay-as-you-go pricing
- **No technical integration** — Works with any game platform
- **Community-powered** — Real gamers who care, not paid click-farmers
- **Radical accessibility** — Professional testing from €2
